short_summary: Shop supply of computer hardware and peripherals to CDIC
description: CDIC is seeking a qualified pool of Suppliers to provide goods including but not limited to: laptops, computers, peripherals, cables, and adapters for any one or multiple of the three Streams offered under the RFSA
full_summary:
============================================

# Computer Hardware, Peripherals and Related Supplies

## Call Number: cb-895-42493978 | Amendment Number: 2 | Solicitation Number: RFSA# 2023-4048

### Publication Date: 2024-02-27 | Tender Closing Date: 2024-04-05 14:00:00 | Amendment Date: 2024-04-05

## Contracting Entity
===============

* **Name:** Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation (CDIC)
* **Address:** 50 O'Connor St, 17th Floor, Ottawa, ON, K1P 6L2, Canada

## Notice Type
==============

* **English:** Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) | **Français:** Demande pour un arrangement en matière d’approvisionnement (DAMA)

## Procurement Category
=====================

* **GSIN:** Not Applicable | **Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)

## Notice Description
=====================

The Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation (CDIC) invites qualified Suppliers to provide Goods including, but not limited to, laptops, computers, peripherals, cables, and adapters. The Goods will be provided on an as-needed basis for a three-year term. The RFSA consists of three Streams:

* **Stream #1:** Laptops and Computing Devices
* **Stream #2:** Peripherals
* **Stream #3:** Cables and Adapters

The RFSA documentation provides further details regarding the Goods and the requirements for Suppliers.

## Contact
=====

* **Name:** Roxanne Séguin
* **Email:** procurement@cdic.ca
* **Phone:** (613) 850-8893

## Download RFSA Documents
=========================

Download the RFSA documents and submission forms from the Canada Buys website:
* [link to attachment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33011/rfsa-2023-4048-computer-hardware%2C-peripherals-and-related-supplies---main-document_3.pdf)
* [link to attachment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33011/cdic-rfsa-2023-4048_addendum-1_en.pdf) (Addendum #1)
* [link to attachment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33011/r
